title: PIXEL 2 XL camera not working , PIEXL help not working
content:
I update my pixel 2 xl this month , then my nightmare is coming , 
First  when I use the camera, it is very often stuck.
After a while, it will flash back.
I use my phone try to find pixel help ,
No matter whether calling or chatting, can't be used.
calling show "Phone support is currently closed. Please try again during business hours."
I already wait 3 days .
chat cant be choice
I send feedback to google pixel .
Did not receive any response
I try to find some Solution on internet, not working  
until now my PIXEL 2 XL camera still not working 
and PIXEL HELP still cant be find.
